styles.name: display
styles.label: Display Mode
styles.description: Atmospheric & narrative — for marketing pages, landing pages, hero sections. Features glassmorphism, generous shadows, dramatic hover lifts.

styles.name: product
styles.label: Product Mode
styles.description: Geometric precision — for SaaS dashboards, admin panels, data-heavy interfaces. No glassmorphism, minimal shadows, no hover lifts.

styles.name: app
styles.label: App Mode
styles.description: Tactile elevation — for mobile apps, touch interfaces, native feel. Subtle hover lifts, native shadows, borderless cards.
